## retainObject() function

Retains a disposable object

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function retainObject(obj: IDisposable): void;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

obj

[IDisposable](doc/markdown/./base.idisposable.md)


</td><td>

Object to retain


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Retains an object will increase the reference counter for this object
